Html:
Hello, i  saw a line in the documentation, 

"You can also register views and services using configuration instead of code." 

How can we do that registration?

What is the configuration? The application configuration file, or something else?

Hi

The following group of articles that belong to the Unity Application Block documentation deal with your scenario:

  • Entering Configuration Information

If you have any other questions related to the Unity Application Block, you can ask them  in the Unity Codeplex forum. The answers there will probably be more specific since it specializes in Unity.

Please let me know if this helps.

Damian Schenkelman
http://blogs.southworks.net/dschenkelman
